author: awinkandanod
title: STOP the REPITITIONS*
text:
[ http://topdocumentaryfilms.com/plutocracy-solidarity-forever/ ]
[ https://www.merriam-webster.com/dictionary/plutocracy ]
( America’s INDIGENOUS can’t be found ‘HERE’.) :
The GRASS WILL GROW 
though “we’re” NOT HERE.
The Apple fruits
“ FOR” our beers.
 
Though BEES ARE “leaving”
NO FOODS will grow.
Cor(e)-Poor- rat/p-e
levers are worked as SHOW.
 
The “striven” RIVENS,
again, raze Heads.
As vivid PALLETS
attempt to STEAD.
 
And, through this all
REPEAT BAD’S lessons.
Can GOOD’S striped BACK
hold for HEALING’S SESSION?
To withhold “entry” do to CITIZENSHIP SHOULD mean that registration be DONE by ALL that CAME here BY ANY BOAT, PLANE OR “SHOE” … AT ANY TIME. 
——–=
[ http://www.reuters.com/article/us-romania-protests-idUSKBN1650WU ]
